forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 65 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the sun shines brightly this afternoon, warming the air to a pleasant near-69 degrees before the gentle embrace of a cool breeze graces the streets. As the day progresses, temperatures will dip slightly, wrapping the city in a comforting embrace as a westerly wind dances through the avenues at speeds of 9 to 17 mph. The atmosphere is clear, with glimpses of the radiant blue sky, though hints of a marine layer linger at the bay’s edge, suggesting a possible spirited reappearance of fog as twilight approaches.

As the evening draws near, the clouds will gather, veiling the sky in soft gray tones. The chance for patchy drizzle will rise late into the night, but for now, it is wise to enjoy the outdoor spaces while they remain dry. One might don a light jacket in anticipation of the cooler evening air, perhaps taking a stroll along the waterfront to savor the city’s shimmering beauty, or settling in at a cozy café to watch the world go by as the golden light fades, turning into an intimate evening in this vibrant metropolis.
